DOC.brief_summary: This study feasibility trial , test hypothesis among sedentary mother behaviorally at-risk preschool-aged child , receive behavioral parent training ( BPT ) program concurrently increase physical activity level demonstrate improve parenting child behavior outcome compare receive BPT remain sedentary .
DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Outcomes Behavioral Parent Training Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator randomly assign 20 participant two group : behavioral parent training plus contingency management increase step ( BPT+CM ) behavioral parent train alone ( BPT ) . Contingency management procedure involve monetary reward meet weekly step-count goal . The specific aim propose project : 1 ) ass feasibility study design procedure , 2 ) ass acceptability BPT+CM condition participant , 3 ) determine whether signal effect increase physical activity exist ( via preliminary comparison measure fatigue , perceive energy , parent behavior , parent sense competence , parent stress , child behavior rating participant two condition ) . This innovative pilot study prepare u fully power trial test efficacy approach .
DOC.criteria: Female Age 18 year old Custodial caregiver child age 25 year live fulltime caregiver 's home Reports child behavioral problem Never rarely engage regular physical activity Able understand , speak , read English The child diagnose severe developmental condition ( e.g. , extreme developmental delay , severe autism , debilitate neurological condition ) Participant report condition may contraindicate physical activity ( e.g. , asthma )
